sentences.en: "I've found the most wonderful house to buy!" she enthused.
sentences.cn: “我已经找到想买的最棒的房子啦！”她兴奋地说。

sentences.en: "Such lovely clothes. I'd no idea Milan was so wonderful," she raved.
sentences.cn: “这些时装太漂亮了。我没想到米兰是如此的精彩，”她赞不绝口。

sentences.en: English food can be wonderful but the normal English diet is abominable.
sentences.cn: 英国也有美食，只是一般的日常饮食太过糟糕。

sentences.en: I grew up around people who had wonderful, mellifluous voices.
sentences.cn: 从小到大，生活在我周围的人都有着悦耳动听的嗓音。

sentences.en: I know a wonderful restaurant where we can have lunch next week.
sentences.cn: 我知道一家很不错的餐厅，下周我们可以去那里吃午饭。

sentences.en: It sounds like a wonderful idea to me, does it really work?
sentences.cn: 听起来这个主意很不错，真的能行吗？

sentences.en: It was a seamless procession of wonderful electronic music.
sentences.cn: 这是一曲优美流畅的电子乐曲。

sentences.en: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.cn: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

sentences.en: On the credit side, he's always been wonderful with his mother.
sentences.cn: 就优点而言，他对母亲一直很孝顺。

sentences.en: She grew many wonderful plants that were unfamiliar to me.
sentences.cn: 她种了很多我不熟悉的奇妙植物。

sentences.en: She now makes wonderful dried flower arrangements to order.
sentences.cn: 现在她为顾客定做漂亮的干花插花。

sentences.en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentences.cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentences.en: They had a wonderful time and so did I.
sentences.cn: 他们玩得很开心，我也一样。

sentences.en: They have just returned from faraway places with wonderful stories to tell.
sentences.cn: 他们刚从遥远的地方回来，有很多精彩的故事要讲。

sentences.en: Watson has a wonderful voice, with thrillingly clear top notes.
sentences.cn: 沃森的嗓音美妙，高音嘹亮动听。

sentences.en: We had a wonderful time in Spain.
sentences.cn: 我们在西班牙玩得非常开心。

words.tran_cn: 奇妙的；令人惊奇的；非常的
奇境，仙境；非常奇妙的地方
令人惊奇的;绝妙的;极好的

trans.tran_cn: 精彩的，令人高兴的，令人惊奇的
trans.tran_en: making you admire someone or something very much
If you describe something or someone as wonderful, you think they are extremely good
